Articles.Content:
Ladies and Gentile-kerbs I bring you the K-130, based off of the C-130.

It is a quite stable aircraft (even by kerbal standards) and can take heavy damage, such as two engines and much of both wings, and still fly.

When landing make sure to have some fuel and land with a bit of power otherwise it will crash nose-first into the ground.

Damned Aerospace it also required!

I\'d love some feedback on this!
Maybe take some mk1 fuselages and put them in for the landing gear, then NovaPunch\'s aerodynamic pointy thing?
